amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $250 million Rapid Innovation Fund from the bill and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the $250 million Rapid Innovation Fund from the bill and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 282 (Roll no. 476).
